it.polimi.se2018.server.network

Interface ConnectionServer

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ConnectionServerRMI, ConnectionServerSocket

    public interface ConnectionServer
extends java.rmi.Remote, java.io.Serializable
    abstract class that manage the connections between Server and Client server side
    Author:
    Samuele Guida

      • sendIsYourTurn

        void sendIsYourTurn(boolean dice,
                    boolean tool)
             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        abstract methot that send the information of a turn for a player
        Parameters:
        dice - boolean TRUE if the player have already positioned a dice, else False
        tool - boolean True if the player gave already used a tool card, else false
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • sendUpdate

        void sendUpdate(java.util.List<Map> maps,
                java.util.List<java.lang.String> users,
                java.lang.String message,
                java.util.List<java.lang.Boolean> tools,
                RoundSchemeCell[] roundSchemeMap,
                java.util.List<Dice> stock,
                java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> favor)
         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        abstract method that send update of the client with a new news
        Parameters:
        maps - an arraylist of maps of all players in game
        users - an arraylist of string of username of all players in game
        message - a generic message_socket
        tools - an arraylist of boolean that manage the use of tool cards
        roundSchemeMap - a matrix of the round scheme map
        stock - a matrix of dices
        favor - an arraylist of integer
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
